answers.answer: V Tach is short for "ventricular tachycardia" and refers to a heart rhythm that is initiated in the ventricles, or lower chambers of the heart, rather than the normal sinus node. It can be life threatening. If the VTach is fast often, there is not enough blood flow coming out of the heart to adequately supply the brain-- people can pass out or even die if it lasts. I'm sorry to hear this about your grandfather.
